languages.text: "При всем уважении, ткач, блюстители уже опросили свидетелей и составили список улик. И ни одна из них не говорит о том, как и куда бежал смутьян, зовущий себя Немезитом".

"With all due respect, Spinner, the enforcers have already questioned all the witnesses and compiled an extensive list of evidence, none of which tells us anything about how or where the troublemaker calling himself Nemesite might have escaped to."
languages.original_text: "При всем уважении, ткач, блюстители уже опросили свидетелей и составили список улик. И ни одна из них не говорит о том, как и куда бежал смутьян, зовущий себя Немезитом".

traits.locale_text: "With all due respect, weaver, the enforcers have already questioned witnesses and compiled a list of evidence. None of which tells us how or where the troublemaker who calls himself Nemesite has escaped to."

"With all due respect, weaver, the enforcers have already questioned witnesses and compiled a list of evidence. None of which tells us how or where the troublemaker who calls himself Nemesite has escaped to."

"With all due respect, weaver, the enforcers have already questioned all the witnesses and compiled an extensive list of evidence, none of which tells us anything about how or where the troublemaker calling himself Nemesite might have escaped to."

"With all due respect, weaver, the enforcers have already questioned all the witnesses and compiled an extensive list of evidence, none of which tells us anything about how or where the troublemaker calling himself Nemesite might have escaped to."

"With all due respect, Spinner, the enforcers have already questioned all the witnesses and compiled an extensive list of evidence, none of which tells us anything about how or where the troublemaker calling himself Nemesite might have escaped to."

"With all due respect, Spinner, the enforcers have already questioned all the witnesses and compiled an extensive list of evidence, none of which tells us anything about how or where the troublemaker calling himself Nemesite might have escaped to."

languages.text: "Bei allem Respekt, Spinnerin, die Enforcer haben bereits alle Zeugen verhört und eine umfassende Beweisliste erstellt, und nichts davon verrät uns, wie oder wohin der Unruhestifter, der sich selbst Nemesit nennt, entkommen sein könnte."
languages.original_text: "With all due respect, Spinner, the enforcers have already questioned all the witnesses and compiled an extensive list of evidence, none of which tells us anything about how or where the troublemaker calling himself Nemesite might have escaped to."

traits.locale_text: "Bei allem Respekt, Spinnerin, die Enforcer haben bereits alle Zeugen verhört und eine umfassende Beweisliste erstellt, und nichts davon verrät uns, wie oder wohin der Unruhestifter, der sich selbst Nemesit nennt, entkommen sein könnte."

languages.text: «Con el debido respeto, tejedora, los guardias ya han interrogado a los testigos presenciales y recopilado una cantidad exhaustiva de pruebas, y nada de eso ha esclarecido cómo o adónde ha escapado ese agitador que se hace llamar Nemesitio».
languages.original_text: "With all due respect, Spinner, the enforcers have already questioned all the witnesses and compiled an extensive list of evidence, none of which tells us anything about how or where the troublemaker calling himself Nemesite might have escaped to."

traits.locale_text: «Con el debido respeto, tejedora, los guardias ya han interrogado a los testigos presenciales y recopilado una cantidad exhaustiva de pruebas, y nada de eso ha esclarecido cómo o adónde ha escapado ese agitador que se hace llamar Nemesitio».

languages.text: 「お言葉だけどね、紡績工。エンフォーサーは既に全ての目撃者に尋問を行い、膨大な証拠リストを作成している。それでもネメサイトと名乗るトラブルメーカーが、どこにどうやって逃亡したかは、何も分かっていないのだよ」
languages.original_text: "With all due respect, Spinner, the enforcers have already questioned all the witnesses and compiled an extensive list of evidence, none of which tells us anything about how or where the troublemaker calling himself Nemesite might have escaped to."

traits.locale_text: 「お言葉だけどね、織り手。エンフォーサーは既に全ての目撃者に尋問を行い、膨大な証拠リストを作成している。それでもネメサイトと名乗るトラブルメーカーが、どこにどうやって逃亡したかは、何も分かっていないのだよ」

languages.text: “恕我直言，织网者，执法者已经询问了所有证人，整理了一份详尽的证据清单。然而，没有任何证据可以显示这个自称‘涅墨斯特’的肇事者使用了什么手段，逃到了什么地方。”
languages.original_text: "With all due respect, Spinner, the enforcers have already questioned all the witnesses and compiled an extensive list of evidence, none of which tells us anything about how or where the troublemaker calling himself Nemesite might have escaped to."

traits.locale_text: “恕我直言，织网者，执法者已经询问了所有证人，整理了一份详尽的证据清单。然而，没有任何证据可以显示这个自称‘涅墨斯特’的肇事者使用了什么手段，逃到了什么地方。”

languages.text: « Avec tout le respect que je vous dois, tisseuse, les prévôts ont déjà interrogé tous les témoins et compilé une longue liste d'indices, sans que cela nous apprenne quoi que ce soit ni sur la façon dont le fauteur de troubles surnommé Némésite a pu s'enfuir ni sur l'endroit où il se trouve. »
languages.original_text: "With all due respect, Spinner, the enforcers have already questioned all the witnesses and compiled an extensive list of evidence, none of which tells us anything about how or where the troublemaker calling himself Nemesite might have escaped to."

traits.locale_text: « Avec tout le respect que je vous dois, tisseuse, les prévôts ont déjà interrogé tous les témoins et compilé une longue liste d'indices, sans que cela nous apprenne quoi que ce soit ni sur la façon dont le fauteur de troubles surnommé Némésite a pu s'enfuir ni sur l'endroit où il se trouve. »

languages.text: "Dokur, saygısızlık etmek istemem ama infazcılar hâlihazırda tüm tanıkları sorgulayıp detaylı bir kanıt listesi oluşturdular. Bunlardan hiçbiri, kendilerini Nemezit olarak adlandıran baş belalarının nasıl ve nereye kaçtıklarını göstermiyor."
languages.original_text: "With all due respect, Spinner, the enforcers have already questioned all the witnesses and compiled an extensive list of evidence, none of which tells us anything about how or where the troublemaker calling himself Nemesite might have escaped to."
